title: Arruda (Fr. Pedro de)
body: Guardian of the Franciscan community of S. João da Ribeira, who raised the original church of the convent of S. Francisco in this city, consecrated in 1554 by the passing bishop D. Sancho Truxillo, in Madeira.

Fr. Pedro de Arruda: Guardian of the Franciscan community of S. João da Ribeira

1554: Consecration of the original church of the convent of S. Francisco
